channel.title: Help with shop please someone!
channel.description:
please dont ask what client type i have i dont realy know lol but my client is beast... but okay the error is i make a shop and add items and stuff and put the npc were i want it so sofar ive used shops.cfg actionhandler.java and prices document... now it sets the prices and opens shop show items but i cant buy the items even though i have enough money.?..
UPDATE I STILL NEED HELP PLEASE but uhm no im not a noobie and no i didnt leech the server !!! i know thats what ur thinking!
[code=javascript]//STAFF ZONE spawn = 1373 2795 3324 0 0 0 0 0 RARESTORE[/code] ^^^^ spawn config works fine [code=javascript]shop = 91 Rare_staff_shop 2 2 1038 1 1040 1 1042 1 1044 1 1046 1 1048 1 [ENDOFSHOPLIST][/code] ^^^shops list works fine shows items [code=javascript] case 1373: c.getShops().openShop(91); break;[/code] ^^^^ works fine opens shops
just cant buy items
UPDATE 2 I ALSO NEED HELP WITH THIS BELOW how do i add tabs to this shop??? this is also the shop that wont sell items
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb395/thewindman/fdadfd.png[/img]

item.title: Help with shop please someone!
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Are you using coins or a special currency to buy the items in the store?

Also check in case you have a prices.txt that the server gets the prices from, If you do, then make sure the prices on there are correct.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with shop please someone!
item.dc:creator: @thewindman78 thewindman78
item.description:
@thewindman78 wrote:

what do you mean? i know my codes are right im just forgeting to add something somewere…
but here they are anyways…

//STAFF ZONE spawn = 1373 2795 3324 0 0 0 0 0 RARESTORE
^^^^ spawn config works fine

shop = 91 Rare_staff_shop 2 2 1038 1 1040 1 1042 1 1044 1 1046 1 1048 1 [ENDOFSHOPLIST]
^^^shops list works fine shows items

case 1373: c.getShops().openShop(91); break;
^^^^ works fine opens shops

just cant buy items

Read full topic
